name: The 14th International Conference on New Ideas in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: IMEACONF has hosted participants from diverse countries worldwide. This event brings together academics, scholars, non-profits, research organizations, and government representatives. IMEACONF is a platform for academics to publish in top journals, build research connections, and enhance their expertise. It also offers opportunities to learn about trends, discuss research, and network. IMEACONF is recognized for accessible knowledge exchange and community development. There is a virtual option for presenting papers remotely and including them in proceedings. After the event, participants can submit full papers for Conference Proceedings, Peer-Reviewed Journals, or as a Monograph, with instructions provided via email. Papers will receive an ISBN, undergo a double-blind review, and be assigned a DOI. Attendees can explore Milanâ€™s culture, cuisine, and hidden gems through a free walking tour. Reviews
topics: Banking Finance Fintech And Regulations Financial
